content: Savings Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Dec 2018What bank account is the best for freelancers - no salary credited? Also, I have $15,000 of spare cash from NS POSB-SAYS - where should I park that money? the two year will be ending in a month+?I'm an nsf waiting for university.. and the two year 2% posb saye savings will end in about a month +. I've got about 15+k in there but now that citi maxigain is gone where else can I put that sum of money? and in future I will probably be freelancing, any saving accounts to look out for? many require a minimum salary requirement thank you!!1 answerAnswerBump0

Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 09 Dec 2018Hi, you can consider CIMB FastSaver which gives 1% interest p.a and doesn't require a minimum salary nor spending. No frills and hassle free, just apply online!0 comments1
